ITargetObject Class Reference

ITargetObject is an interface for providing target related functionality. Any objects that modify or provide target data are required to implement this class. More...

Detailed Description

ITargetObject is an interface for providing target related functionality. Any objects that modify or provide target data are required to implement this class.
